author: veithen
msg: In the generated test cases, don't attempt to catch exceptions thrown during stub instantiation. Instead, let JUnit (or the IDE or the surefire/failsafe plugin, etc.) report the exception.

author: rdonkin
msg: RAT-122 Maven Plugin: field to ignore errors and continue the build; RAT-121 use maven java5 annotations for maven plugins; RAT-120 fix some maven warning and upgrade some dependencies. Many thanks to Olivier Lamy

author: milamber
msg: Add New and Noteworthy for next JMeter release 2.8
